languages.text: "Другие полагают, что, упав с неба, Единственная звезда стала святым цепным мечом, коим Ардженте в будущем предстояло разить чудовищ и врагов Империума. На некоторых ранних гравюрах Арджента изображена в силовой броне с серебряной звездой на груди — по одному из мнений богословов, эта броня и есть реликвия. Есть даже мнение, что Единственная звезда на деле — это корабль, на котором летала Арджента".

"Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."
languages.original_text: "Другие полагают, что, упав с неба, Единственная звезда стала святым цепным мечом, коим Ардженте в будущем предстояло разить чудовищ и врагов Империума. На некоторых ранних гравюрах Арджента изображена в силовой броне с серебряной звездой на груди — по одному из мнений богословов, эта броня и есть реликвия. Есть даже мнение, что Единственная звезда на деле — это корабль, на котором летала Арджента".

Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta traveled."

In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “还有人认为，命运之星从天上掉下来之后，变成了一把神圣的链锯剑。他们认为阿洁塔挥舞着那把链锯剑，击溃了怪物与帝国之敌。而在一部分早期雕刻作品中，阿洁塔的形象是穿着动力装甲的战士，胸前有一颗银色的星星。某种神学理论身为，这件动力装甲正是那件圣遗物。还有一部分人甚至认为，命运之星实际上指的是阿洁塔乘坐的那艘飞船。”
languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

traits.locale_text: “还有人认为，命运之星从天上掉下来之后，变成了一把神圣的链锯剑。他们认为阿洁塔挥舞着那把链锯剑，击溃了怪物与帝国之敌。而在一部分早期雕刻作品中，阿洁塔的形象是穿着动力装甲的战士，胸前有一颗银色的星星。某种神学理论身为，这件动力装甲正是那件圣遗物。还有一部分人甚至认为，命运之星实际上指的是阿洁塔乘坐的那艘飞船。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

languages.text: «Otros creen que al caer del cielo la Estrella Única se convirtió en una espada sierra sagrada que Argenta usaría para abatir a monstruos y enemigos del Imperium por igual. En algunos de los primeros grabados, Argenta aparece vistiendo una servoarmadura con una estrella de plata en el pecho. Hay al menos una corriente teológica que cree que la reliquia es esa misma armadura. Y hasta hay otros que creen que la Estrella Única es la propia nave en la que viajó santa Argenta».
languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

traits.locale_text: «Otros creen que al caer del cielo la Estrella Única se convirtió en una espada sierra sagrada que Argenta usaría para abatir a monstruos y enemigos del Imperium por igual. En algunos de los primeros grabados, Argenta aparece vistiendo una servoarmadura con una estrella de plata en el pecho. Hay al menos una corriente teológica que cree que la reliquia es esa misma armadura. Y hasta hay otros que creen que la Estrella Única es la propia nave en la que viajó santa Argenta».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「またある者は、空から降ってきた「一つ星」は聖なる鎖の剣となり、後にアルジェンタが帝国の怪物や敵を打ち倒すのに使ったという説を唱えている。初期の版画の中には、アルジェンタが胸に銀の星をあしらったパワーアーマーを着ているものもある。ある神学説によれば、このアーマーこそが聖遺物であったというのだ。また、「一つ星」はアルジェンタが乗っていた船であるという説もある」
languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

traits.locale_text: 「またある者は、空から降ってきた「一つ星」は聖なる鎖の剣となり、後にアルジェンタが帝国の怪物や敵を打ち倒すのに使ったという説を唱えている。初期の版画の中には、アルジェンタが胸に銀の星をあしらったパワーアーマーを着ているものもある。ある神学説によれば、このアーマーこそが聖遺物であったというのだ。また、「一つ星」はアルジェンタが乗っていた船であるという説もある」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Andere glauben, dass der Eine Stern, nachdem er vom Himmel gefallen war, zu einem heiligen Kettenschwert wurde, mit dem Argenta später Monster und Feinde des Imperiums niederstreckte. In einigen der frühesten Gravuren wir Argenta in einer Servorüstung mit einem silbernen Stern auf der Brust gezeigt. Einer theologischen Theorie zufolge war diese Rüstung in Wahrheit das Relikt. Manche glauben gar, dass der Eine Stern in Wahrheit das Schiff ist, auf dem Argenta reiste."
languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

traits.locale_text: "Andere glauben, dass der Eine Stern, nachdem er vom Himmel gefallen war, zu einem heiligen Kettenschwert wurde, mit dem Argenta später Monster und Feinde des Imperiums niederstreckte. In einigen der frühesten Gravuren wir Argenta in einer Energierüstung mit einem silbernen Stern auf der Brust gezeigt. Einer theologischen Theorie zufolge war diese Rüstung in Wahrheit das Relikt. Manche glauben gar, dass der Eine Stern in Wahrheit das Schiff ist, auf dem Argenta reiste."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « D'autres estiment qu'en tombant du ciel, l'Étoile unique est devenue une épée tronçonneuse sacrée, qu'Argenta a ensuite utilisée pour terrasser des monstres et des ennemis de l'Imperium. Dans certaines gravures plus anciennes, Argenta est dépeinte avec une armure énergétique flanquée d'une étoile argentée sur la poitrine. Une théorie théologique suggère que cette armure est en fait la relique elle-même. D'aucuns affirment même que l'Étoile unique est en vérité le vaisseau dans lequel voyageait Argenta. »
languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

traits.locale_text: « D'autres estiment qu'en tombant du ciel, l'Étoile unique est devenue une épée tronçonneuse sacrée, qu'Argenta a ensuite utilisée pour terrasser des monstres et des ennemis de l'Imperium. Dans certaines gravures plus anciennes, Argenta est dépeinte avec une armure énergétique flanquée d'une étoile argentée sur la poitrine. Une théorie théologique suggère que cette armure est en fait la relique elle-même. D'aucuns affirment même que l'Étoile unique est en vérité le vaisseau dans lequel voyageait Argenta. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Başkalarıysa gökten düştüğünde Emsalsiz Yıldız'ın yüce bir motorlu kılıca dönüştüğünü düşünmüş. Argenta, daha sonra bu kılıçla İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarını ve canavarları alt etmiş. Eski işlemelerin bazılarında Argenta'yı göğüs kısmında gümüş renkli bir yıldız olan güç zırhıyla resmetmişler. Bir ilahiyat kuramına göre yadigâr, zırhın kendisiymiş. Hatta bazıları, Emsalsiz Yıldız'ın bizzat Argenta'nın gemisi olduğunu düşünmüş."
languages.original_text: "Others think that upon falling from the sky, the One Star became a holy chainsword, which Argenta later used to strike down monsters and enemies of the Imperium. In some of the earlier engravings, Argenta is depicted wearing power armour with a silver star on her chest — one theological theory suggests that this armour was, in fact, the relic. Some even think that the One Star is actually the ship on which Argenta travelled."

traits.locale_text: "Başkalarıysa gökten düştüğünde Emsalsiz Yıldız'ın yüce bir motorlu kılıca dönüştüğünü düşünmüş. Argenta, daha sonra bu kılıçla İmparatorluk'un düşmanlarını ve canavarları alt etmiş. Eski işlemelerin bazılarında Argenta'yı göğüs kısmında gümüş renkli bir yıldız olan güç zırhıyla resmetmişler. Bir ilahiyat kuramına göre yadigâr, zırhın kendisiymiş. Hatta bazıları, Emsalsiz Yıldız'ın bizzat Argenta'nın gemisi olduğunu düşünmüş."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
